document_data.caption: A map showing Rodanar on the Akanamere.
document_data.name: Rodanar
document_data.mainbody: '''Rodanar''' was a town located in the country of [[Chessenta]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B1dlc}}
document_data.Geography: The town lay on the northwest shore of the [[Akanamere]] in western Chessenta, just south of the [[Akanapeaks]].
document_data.Inhabitants: Some 5,000 people lived in Rodanar in the {{YearlinkName|1357}}, and 1,000 of these belonged to the garrison. Rodanar was led by a [[warrior]] named [[Hyurkes]].
document_data.History: The war god [[Tchazzar]] founded Rodanar to serve as a fortress to thwart [[orc]] incursions from the Akanapeaks. Rodanar used to be a large city, but a war with [[Akanax]] during the 12{{th}} century [[DR]] left it in ruins. The new Rodanar that sprung up since was much smaller.
